pullRequest.title: Fold RelationshipInterpreter into RelationshipTracker.
pullRequest.bodyText:
The extra inheritance just added extra complexity without benefit and the child class actually referenced the parent in one of the methods.
This change is actually save-game compatible, as the parent class had no member fields. (Unlike what I thought in the initial commit message.)
Functional Changes

[] New map or map update
[] New Feature
[] Feature update or enhancement
[] Feature Removal
[X] Code Cleanup or refactor
[] Configuration Change
[] Problem fix:  
[] Other:   
Testing
Couple round of all-AI game on WW2 path to victory.
Also tested loading save games from previous 2.0 versions.

commit.message:
Fold RelationshipInterpreter into RelationshipTracker.

The extra inheritance just added extra complexity without
benefit and the child class actually referenced the parent
in one of the methods.

Note: This is a save-breaking changei. We can avoid that by
still keeping the parent class around but making it an empty
class.

nodes.bodyText: RelationshipTracker has 24 methods (exceeds 20 allowed). Consider refactoring.

commit.message: Restore serialVersionUID as the change is actually compatible.
Merge branch 'merge_rel' of https://github.com/asvitkine/triplea into merge_rel
